q: heads Stateside after impressing on the UK version, but producers are unconvinced and believe American audiences may prefer a more recognisable star such as Rihanna or Katy Perry . A friend of Cheryl's rumoured boyfriend Derek Hough said: Everyone thinks Cheryl has the judging job on US' X Factor' in the bag. "The truth is, nothing has been signed and the producers still aren't convinced. "They are more keen to get a big US star like Katy Perry or Rihanna on the panel- someone who will bring credibility to the show and who is already popular in the US. Simon Cowell is now reportedly doing all he can to convince his American business partners that the 27-year-old Girls Aloud star has what it takes to draw audiences in across the Atlantic.

Great gift ideas for guys on V-Day Find out his hobbies. If the guy is into wine you'll want to get a fabulous decanter. If the guy's into cigars maybe a humidor. Find out what he collects, what he's interested in. It can be as simple as golf balls with his name on it. You can come up with really cool concepts. In just filed court papers Camille asks a judge to deny Kelsey's request to dissolve their 13 year marriage while they continue battling over their 120 million dollar estate. Camille writes in the court papers, It is my understanding that( Kelsey) is seeking to terminate the marriage solely for the reason that he intends to remarry as soon as possible. "I don't believe that is a sufficient reason to prejudice my rights to our estate. The Frasier star appeared on the Late Show with David Letterman Thursday night and sounded resolute about his plans for a quickie divorce from Camille, so he can tie the knot with Kayte Walsh soon.
